step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You're holding the stretch well. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Great job reversing the motion. Try to maintain the elbow position as you return to the start.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when bringing your hands up and spread them wide behind your head. This helps stretch your shoulders and chest effectively.
